venue.name: Microsoft New England Research and Development Center

item.description:
Once again, the Boston WordPress July 2009 Meetup will happen at Microsoft Cambridge and feature a presentation for the first hour and a half, followed by 30 minutes of networking & open discussion.

http://www.microsoftc...

Our speaker this month is Brian Krausz, developer, entrepreneur, blogger and more. Brian will be presenting a "Plugin Potluck," where he will present a number of plugins that are useful, innovative, powerful, or a combination of all three! Come find out how you can make your WordPress installation truely yours by customizing it to fit you exact needs.

Please help by answering the 3 questions you will be prompted with upon RSVPing to this month's event.
item.how_to_find_us: Conference Room (more details at the front desk)
item.name: Boston WordPress July 2009 Meetup
